attributes.action: to have a public inquiry on grooming gangs in the UK
attributes.additional_details: To allow the inquiry to gather the experiences of all local authorities and to provide a legal framework,  guidance and resources to enable a unified approach which will prevent further failings
attributes.background:
As a society we need to acknowledge our failings to thousands of innocent victims in order to learn from the failings .

We need to listen to local authorities experiences and provide a radical overhaul into how we as a society support victims of grooming gangs

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:
 
Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
